name: geniopay
description: GenioPay is a sustainable borderless payment platform that drastically undercuts the incumbents by allowing customers to save huge on transfers in 70 currencies, and real-time exchange rates.  Considered the Swiss Army Knife of borderless payments, We help retail customers and businesses accept payments and send payouts globally in one unified platform. Move digital money leveraging traditional payment rails and do business in a more global, scalable and efficient way.
